::Savanna/ Spitfire::

Savanna:: 
She turned and was hit by Destruction and fell tot he ground in 
pain.  She let out a blood curdling scream and wriethed on the ground 
in pain. The grenade went off and she was hit by shrapnel. She went 
unconious from the pain. 

Sptifire::
She took a hit to the abdoman and was shot back a few feet.  The 
blast from the grenade struck her in the back.   She fell to the 
ground unconsious and entered stasis lock. 



-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Imprisoner/Predator/Choran:
> 
> 
> Imprisoner sighed when Savanna jumped off.  -Psycho- he thought to 
himself.  
> Acting his inner monologue comm. unit.
> 
> -=Alright, now, Predator, inside group attack, Choran, pick 'em off 
with your 
> weapon.  I'll take them down with mine=-
> 
> No response from the others, that was good.
> 
> "Fine, if you must know, we are going to the Ark to burn graffiti 
into it." 
> Imprisoner said smuggly, a sonic blaster appearing in his hands.  
With the 
> flick of a button, he switched the setting from 'Destruction' to 
> 'Incapacitate'.
> 
> (Destruction, as in when fired upon something it does damage, 
Incapaciate if 
> will eventually knock people, distort their thoughts, and cause a 
bit of pain)
> 
> He fired a 'continuous' blast off at the grouped Maximals, Hot Rod, 
Spitfire, 
> and Savanna.
> 
> His hands going forward quickly, a grenade launcher appeared in 
Predator's 
> hands.  Taking aim quickly, he fired off a grenade, aimed at a 
position that 
> was three feet behind the Maximals, the grenade going between their 
legs, 
> heading for the intended position.
> 
> Choran took a step forward, his hands going forward violently, a 
heavy laser 
> rifle appearing in his hands.  Cocking the weapon, he fired off a 
laser blast 
> at Spitfire's abdomen.
